bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of chuang 瘡 , sores, conditions that emerge on the lips or to the side of the mouth. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry jia jian 甲煎：三年者治蟲雜瘡及口旁饞瘡、甲疽等瘡 , “With those [ jia jian ] that are three years old one may treat sores such as various bug-related sores and gluttony sores to the side of the mouth, as well as nails with impediment - illnesses”.
